capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. He was indeed the Potions master during my time there. I remember him being quite intimidating at first, but as I got to know him, his complexities and depth became apparent.

Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was a double agent working for the Order of the Phoenix while pretending to be a loyal Death Eater. It's hard to say whether his true loyalties were with the Dark Lord or with Dumbledore and the wizarding world at large.
